name: Core Blockchain
description: Core Blockchain is a Layer-1 PoW Blockchain that provides decentralized, secure, and scalable real-world solutions that impact not only the blockchain's end users but also the real-world environment around them. Core Blockchainâ€™s innovative RWA-centric approach and DePIN solutions connect blockchain and decentralized technology with real assets, people, and infrastructures with the goal of regaining autonomy for users and rebuilding outdated systems.
